title: LLM Prompt Envelope (author ➜ model)
$comment: Always 2 or 3 items. All elements are *required* when present.

prefixItems.title: USER_MESSAGE
prefixItems.description: Human instruction or question sent to the model.

prefixItems.title: CURRENT_ITEM
prefixItems.description: The scene (or sub-scene) JSON the user is editing.

prefixItems.title: FULL_PIPELINE (optional)
prefixItems.description: If present, every scene in the project—used for global checks.
